text: deze app heeft enkele serieuze tekortkomingen en storende en reproduceerbare bugs. translated: this app has some serious flaws and bothersome and reproducible bugs.With the updates nothing changes so far.- terribly slow build-up (up to 25 to 30 seconds), on a device like the J7 2016 that is not necessary and a sign of bad code / programming.- abnormally bad touch response, probably due to incorrect size of surfaces to be clicked - reproducible when opening program, opening the previous program that was opened the day before
